description:
From their law office in Crown Point, Indiana, the attorneys at Marshall P. Whalley & Associates, PC, provide unmatched counsel and support to clients throughout Lake County and across the state. The firm helps those who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

For more than 30 years, the firm has served the hard-working men and women of Indiana by providing knowledgeable, professional and effective representation at all turns. During this time, the firm has recovered more than $80 million in total compensation for its plaintiff clients. This level of success is the direct result of the attorneys' more than 100 years of combined legal experience coupled with their unwavering commitment to those they serve.

When you work with Marshall P. Whalley & Associates, PC, you will receive the benefit of working directly with a compassionate and highly rated lawyer who has your best interests at heart. Regardless of the cause of your suffering, you can rely on firm attorneys to explain your options to help you make the best-informed decisions as they aggressively pursue the favorable outcome you expect and deserve.

Honored for their outstanding professionalism and service, their attorneys have earned Top 100 Trial Lawyer rankings from the National Trial Lawyers along with many other top rankings and endorsements from their peers. They have also received the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys as well as numerous testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients.

To find out more about how the lawyers can best serve your needs at Marshall P. Whalley & Associates, PC, you can contact their law office or visit their website to schedule a free case evaluation. The firm also offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
